name: Arcane Focus
description: An Arcane Focus is a special item designed to channel the power of arcane spells. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

variants.name: Crystal
variants.description: A small crystal orb or gem used to focus arcane energy.

variants.name: Orb
variants.description: A polished glass or crystal sphere used as a focus for arcane spells.

variants.name: Rod
variants.description: A short metal or wood shaft used to focus arcane spells.

variants.name: Staff
variants.description: A full-length staff crafted from wood or metal, used as a focus for arcane spells.

variants.name: Wand
variants.description: A slender wooden or metal rod used to focus arcane spells.
